resources:
Droid Dashcam - Driving video recorder
Any Close` Default Disabled (no ads) zoom reset Unknown
Camera Aperture Back Camera App needs to be launched once to be able to access the camera in the background DroidDashcam: Video recording has been stopped because camera is used by another app DroidDashcam: Video recording has been stopped because device camera has stopped working On Android 11+ before starting a background recording service app has to be launched and visible at least once to be able to use camera in background. So after a device reboot make app visible and after that don\'t close recording service, it should stay in notification center External USB Camera Focal length Angle of view (16:9) vertical horizontal Front Camera Camera was in use by other app . Please don\'t use or start other apps which may use camera while recording videos . Android allows only one app to use camera at the same time Camera (was) temporarily unavailable for opening on your device (system camera error) Error happened during using Camera.
This device doesn\'t have built-in camera and doesn\'t support external cameras. Closing… No camera found Go to Settings Report error Select camera Skip Cancel locking current video from overwriting?
Thank you so much for support! If you want ad-free app the donation has to be or more You are free from ads. Your donation level: Purchases info is not loaded yet. Is network connection available and is signed in Google account? Donate monthly (no ads for any amount) Cancel subscription
Degrees GB Hz kbit/s Mbit/s m GPS Speed km/h mph Altitude min
Could not start a floating window If you reinstalled App on Android 11, then the old files must be deleted manually DroidDashcam has lost the camera control . Please open DroidDashcam again to return the camera control. Battery optimization -> All apps -> Droid Dashcam -> Don\'t optimize DroidDashcam: Device camera service has died, restarting… Close app settings before starting recording Could not enable microphone, recording will continue without audio Could not open those settings from this app, please try to find them using default (system) settings app of the device Could not open app… G-sensor has detected impact, video will be locked from overwriting Initializing… Please wait! Please install a web-browser app to open a link No GPS signal No network to fetch address or try to reboot device Could not delete video file. You may have reinstalled the app and permission for the file was lost, try to delete it manually Please free some space to continue video recording Not enough memory Stopping recording… (Settings are opened) Stop recording first, then you can close the service Please wait a second before stopping recording immediately after starting To change camera the current recording has to be stopped To close this service please firstly minimize or close Droid Dashcam app video was locked from overwriting and saved, next video will also be marked as locked (can be canceled by clicking lock button) All videos size is of allowed max space Video was locked and saved, next video will also be marked as locked (can be canceled by clicking lock button again) There is not enough battery power on the device . Put on charge or start recording if the charge is higher 1%% Something went wrong with recoding module. TTS (Android speech synthesizer) language package is not installed. Enable internet to start downloading it Please close other apps which use a camera and restart this app Recording folder destination was changed. Because it is not available or no storage (write) permission was granted Droid Dashcam isn\'t excluded from battery optimization . If camera doesn\'t work in background or something else doesn\'t work then add this app to exceptions of energy saving mode Stopping recording. No enough memory to continue Photo saved Failed to take photo Camera is not started Please delete old videos, format SD card or try another one . Please also limit the maximum space for recording videos (less space is better) . Many saved videos can cause such issues . Read FAQ about SD cards at Settings/FAQ . You can also try to record to phone storage instead Found old video files Seems you reinstalled an application. You have old videos which app can\'t delete during loop recording. Please delete them manually at Videos screen before recording new videos. Starting from Android 11+ app loses write access to old files on reinstalling . Or you can grant write storage permission for the recording folder Incorrect folder . Please do no not change the path . You have to grant the permission for specific folder . You change the recording folder at the settings. You have stopped the auto-start video background service. Open the DroidDashcam app to start it again
AudioJack(Aux) Bluetooth Watcher Charging Tap on the notification to start app. Seems you don\'t have a permission to draw over all apps or device was locked Could not start a service for recording on device boot Stop To auto start/stop recording Could not start recording service. Please click to disable battery optimization for this app
Audio permission is needed for adding audio during video recording Audio permission Camera permission is needed for video recording and camera preview Camera permission This app needs permission for Camera for video recording. But you have declined it. Closing… Try to give Camera permission in System Settings for this app When the app is closed DroidDashcam use location in the background to draw coordinates, address and speed subtitles on a currently recording video. On Android 11 (R) you need to select \"All all the time\" manually in the System Settings for accessing location in the background. Settings will be opened after this dialog. Location permission is needed for calculating vehicle speed using GPS data, the current address and coordinates for display them on the screen and recording subtitles on videos Location permission Storage permission is needed for saving video files to shared public media folder and for loop recording mode Storage permission Audio & Location permissions Audio, Location & Storage permissions Audio & Storage permissions Camera & Location permissions Location & Storage permissions Grant write storage
Disabled because this device doesn\'t support geocoding Show animated circle around recording button Animated recording circle Encoding bitrate (quality) Sampling rate Audio recording Quality, Switch On/Off Recording Audio Settings Stereo Starts recording automatically when audio is connected to phone jack (AUX). For the audio watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin Start on audio jack (AUX) connection Stop on audio jack (AUX) disconnection The permission is not granted. It\'s needed for speed, address and coordinates updates during background video recording. Tap this to fix it now Background Location permission Battery optimization can stop app from working right (e.g. using camera or location updates during background video recording). Tap this to disable it for this app now Battery optimization Starts recording automatically when a bluetooth device connects. For the bluetooth watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin Start on bluetooth device connection Stop on bluetooth device disconnection Starts recording automatically when system starts, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin. It can take several minutes after boot before the system informs the app that it has started On system boot Auto (Day/Night), based on time Day Night @string/donate_text Donate, Disable ads Support app development Donate Answers to frequent questions from to (day only, stable) (day & night) Ignore GPS updates with error higher Show warning if GPS and Google Location Accuracy are disabled Show warning only if GPS disabled Do not show warning and the fix button GPS disabled warning and the fix button Info / More… Your device has settings to allow apps to auto-start and run in the background. Click here and add the app to exceptions (allow autostart, etc.) to allow background and off screen work if it\'s forbidden Allowing background and off screen work Not chosen App to launch by the button Location Manager (old method) If speed values are bad then try the old method. If values are zero or rarely updated then try the new method Location (GPS) provider method meters of accuracy Optical zoom (Focal length) Automatically delete oldest videos during recording if there is not enough space for new videos Loop recording Starts recording automatically when app launches On app start Keep screen on Enable to use miles instead of kilometers Use miles, feet Recording Video Location (Folder/Path) Photo Location (Folder/Path) Recording Location (Folder), Video Duration, Loop Recording, G-shock sensor, GPS Other Settings Address Altitude (elevation) Coordinates Speed Select elements to be shown on screen Video duration - How often to save Launch app Buttons/elements on floating window Close overlay Drag overlay Display speed Open videos screen Zoom in/out by two fingers Pinch to zoom Policy Starts recording automatically when starts charging. For the charging watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin Start when charging is connected Stop when charging is disconnected Charging Bluetooth Audio jack (AUX) Rate this App on Play Store Rate Recommendations Lock video from auto-deleting (overwriting) on impact detection G-shock sensor G-sensor sensitivity Vibrate on impact detection Select specific bluetooth device or any Max memory of all videos (loop recording) On app launch, charging on/off, boot Autostart recording Short/Long taps, keep screen on, display address and speed, floating window, buttons, etc Interface (UI) Automatically switches camera day/night modes at specific time (sunrise and sunset) Day/Night auto mode settings Higher bitrate better quality but larger video file size More FPS - smoother video, but also drains battery. It\'s better to set first value to the lowest (second can be bigger) for better recording in the darkness Send this App to your Friends or Family Share Audio recording switch Change camera, audio, lock video overwrite, night mode and flash buttons Buttons on the screen Camera switch Day/Night/Auto mode switch Flash switch Lock video from overwriting (save) Take photo Displays overlay with control buttons over all apps Show floating window Show system status bar Address, speed, coordinates Electronic (EIS) - Recommended It\'s not supported by current camera . Manufacturers often restrict its use and it\'s available only in standard Camera app Optical (OIS) Voice over when recording starts, stops or fails Voice on recording status change Location Address Overlay Select subtitles color Location Coordinates Overlay Date format Date (Timestamp) Overlay System Subtitles in English Overlay Captions on Video: Date (Timestamp), Location Address, Coordinates and Speed Subtitles Settings Increase text size Speed Overlay (opaque) Time format Text transparency (alpha) Frequent updates - faster battery runs out (frequent network requests) Update Address Frequency GPS update frequency Update location using GPS only (don\'t use network) Report about error, crash or make a suggestion Support / Feedback Allow this app to show on top of all other apps. It\'s needed to auto start/stop video recording or for displaying floating window System Alert Window Go back to main (recording) screen to apply this setting (to start watcher service) Settings None Start/stop recording Quick tap on the screen Long tap on the screen App version Recording bitrate (quality) Camera Control Scene Mode (Night) Camera Control Scene Mode (Day) General/Face Priority HDR (High dynamic range) Night (for low-light settings) Dawn (Sunrise) time Sunset time Day, Night or Auto mode Exposure compensation (Night) Exposure compensation (Day) Horizontally flip of video frames. Only for video recording, it doesn\'t change preview Reversed video (mirroring) Continuous Picture Continuous Video (Recommended at Day) Infinity (Recommended at Night) Camera focus (Night) Camera focus (Day) Max frames per second (FPS) Record in HEVC (H.265) format to save space. You may not be able to play HEVC videos on other devices or with some app players. Will reset resolution & bitrate after changing High efficiency video coding Video and phone orientation Video resolution Resolution, Bitrate, Orientation, Focus, Camera, Night mode Video Settings Bigger size - faster battery drains Unlimited Video stabilization Digital zoom second seconds seconds seconds Custom additional text For example, vehicle registration plate Size of buttons on floating window Landscape Reverse Landscape Portrait Very High High Normal Low Very Low Start recording when speed is equal to/greater than (based on GPS) Stop recording when speed is below (based on GPS) Stop recording after Start recording on motion detection Stop recording when there is no movement Motion detection by camera

Could not start Droid Dashcam service to auto start/stop recording. Because SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (shown on top of all other apps) permission is not granted . Or device was locked at this moment (limitation on Android that device has to be unlocked first and its screen has to be turned on before service for auto recording can be started) On boot completed

Automatic recording only when the service is running If you enable this option, then automatic recording will not be performed if the monitoring service is not running and is not visible in the notification panel

The application\'s main screen could not be launched because the SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (display on top of all other application windows) permission was not granted or the device\'s screen was turned off
To access the ultra-wide camera (lens), you can set the zoom ratio below 1.0x This is necessary to get the most accurate GPS-based speed, as well as address and coordinates. Tap to grant it Precise Location permission Required to be able to display the background recording service and statuses on the notification panel. Tap to grant it Notification permission
